subject: re:Don't have time to visit local drug store
body:
Dear valued member.
Tell us straight - are you really that eager to buy artificially overpriced product? Stop wasting time and money - switch to Canadian products.
Everyone knows that Canadian drugs are as qualitative as the ones made in the USA but they are much cheaper. Imagine what happens with their price if we take 20% off. We've got a huge lot of high-quality product in stock - and we are really eager to get rid of it.
Get the best deal right now while the Spring Sale is still on - visit MyCanadianPharmacy right now.http://knewpush.hk
-------------------------------------------
Yours faithfully,Rosalyn Nickels
